pr_title: Use a double for damage related keys.

timeline.bodyText: Is it treated differently compared to how the implementation uses this integer? I figure the implementation stores this value to nbt, so would we be modifying the implementation to store a double instead?
timeline.author: gabizou

replies.bodyText: For now, I was thinking about just internally converting it to int and back. But storing could also be an option.
replies.author: Cybermaxke

timeline.message:
Use a double for damage related keys.

Using an int is an impl detail, damage is represented as doubles.
